replies.body:
> Change everything to Maokai's voice

Gonna' go out on a limb and guess that you main Maokai....

> > Change everything to Maokai's voice
> 
> Gonna' go out on a limb and guess that you main Maokai....

Hah Hah "Limb"

It would actually be nice if Riot did a massive Voice upgrade to the announcer. Like, being able to buy champion themed voices for the announcer, kind of like what Smite does.

If im playing Noctunre and i buy the Noc voice pack, the announcer turns to nocturne. So Nocturne announces so long as im playing him. Each champ has his own announcer purchasable voice.

It would also be a great opportunity to add more Announcer lines, cuz god knows there are too few.
I don't know, I like the current announcer. She reminds me of the TF2 Announcer **"Alert, enemy is capturing our Inhibitors!"**

Don't know for other language, but in french, when you spectate a game, she cheer more for the blue team than the purple team :p

When blue side take a dragon, it's like she has an orgasm, when purple side do it it's just "meh, they take the lizard thing" (same for tower and baron of course^^)
